arts.ttl: Arsenal given Nico Williams hope by David Ornstein
arts.sum: David Ornstein has given Arsenal hope of signing Nico Williams but says that any deal will be in the summer and not January. The player that Mikel Arteta loves is Nico Williams of Athletic Bilbao," Ornstein said.

arts.sum: Real Madrid star Vinícius Jr. moved to make clear his appreciation for the latest endeavours of attacking partner-in-crime Kylian Mbappé late this week. This comes after Mbappé found the net…

Athletic Club currently sit in the Champions League places, and they could go nine points clear of Villarreal in fifth place with a victory. Celta Vigo have been difficult to beat at home in La Liga ...

arts.ttl: Chelsea make IMPROVED offer for Nico Williams alternative
arts.sum: Chelsea have submitted an improved offer for Yeremay Hernandez, according to Spanish media. Earlier this week, Chelsea had a €10 million bid knocked back by Deportivo despite also being open to the possibility of including players in the deal and offering a significant sell-on percentage.

arts.ttl: Former Manchester United, PSG star Ander Herrera joins Boca Juniors
arts.sum: Former Manchester United and Paris Saint-Germain midfielder Ander Herrera has joined Argentinian giants Boca Juniors, the club announced on Friday. "My father worked here [in Argentina] for a long time, he told me a lot about Boca and I have maintained that passion since I was a child," Herrera said.
